dt: {bc}the movement of a club, racket, bat, or arm {a_link|backward} to a position from which the forward or downward swing is made

shortdef: the movement of a club, racket, bat, or arm backward to a position from which the forward or downward swing is made

stems: be (back) in the swing of things
be back in the swing of things
be in the swing of things

dt: {bc}fully involved and comfortable with (a regular activity, process, etc.)

dt.t: After a while, she {phrase}got into the swing of{/phrase} her new job.
I've been away on vacation but I should {phrase}be (back) in the swing of things{/phrase} in a few days.

shortdef: fully involved and comfortable with (a regular activity, process, etc.)
